it will not work without a hardware ID because your activation code is generated according to the hardware ID. i have tried all the keys provided. it does not work. work on a crack
u noobs its working u just dont know how to do it... if I played for a mounth then its working with the same key as all

INSTRUCTIONS
- Install the game
- Install the 1.2.0.0 patch
- Copy "PCM-Protection.dll" from Crack folder to the game folder and overwrite
- Run "PCM.exe"
- Enter the "Serial Number" from "serial.txt"
- Click "activation by other means"
- Enter the "Activation Key" from "serial.txt" and click "Next"
- Use "Player Code" from "serial.txt" to create new account in the game
